raw_body: Beloved husband of Rezani, loving father of Kamran, Aftab and Maalik, loving father-in-law of Shabnam, Renee and Amaya, adored appa to Neve, Aria and Zaid, son of late M.H.A. Aziz and late Jiffriya Aziz, son-in-law of late Zain Markar and of Rifka Markar, loving brother of late Shibly Aziz, Minha Ahamed, Imthiaz Aziz and Ryhan Ghouse, brother-in-law of Fathima Aziz, Illyas Ahamed, Yasmin Aziz, Mazhar Ghouse, Rasheeda Asgerally and Riyadha Ismail.
